name: Switch Girl: Special Rescue Beauty - Demo
name_original: Switch Girl: Special Rescue Beauty - Demo
description:
Product in early development Overview

Creatures are being corrupted by a dark nebula over the utopic Kaiya planet. Saturn Lovelise, also known as the Switch Girl, devotes herself to protect the peace and bring love to everyone. A 2D platformer game with puzzle elements.

Controls
  • Arrows: Movement
  • Z or S: Kiss
  • X or D: Jump
  • C or F: Rainbool
  • Shift: Shift Kiss
  • Enter or P: Start
    * There is controller support, but I have only tested a Xbox 360 controller on Windows
